Win a Collectors-Edition iPad 2!

November 1st, 2011 by The Jilion Team
Tweet

To celebrate the release of Aelios 2 we’re running a Twitter contest; visit aeliosapp.com or click the button below to enter for a chance to win a one of a kind, laser-engraved Aelios iPad 2!

The contest will end at midnight (ET) on 8th November 2011. We’ll be announcing the winner on Twitter – check out aeliosapp.com for the full contest details. Make sure to tell your friends!

UPDATE: The contest has now ended, thanks to everybody who participated! We’ll be announcing the winner on Twitter shortly.
